sections.subtitle: Dive In for a Chance to Launch Your Side Project at SXSWi Startup Oasis

sections.title: Ship to Win - Jan 31
sections.subtitle: Launch your project on ⋈ BowTie.io and win awesome prizes.

columns.title: Tools
columns.content: 1 year of hosting for your project on BowTie, with premium support. Legal setup + trademark service for your startup from Lerner Venture Law

columns.title: Time
columns.content: 6 months free at ABQ's best coworking space: Fatpipe ABQ - including fiber internet, utilities, and access to other amazing entrepreneurs.

columns.title: Exposure
columns.content: Grand prize winner will present their project on stage at Startup Oasis during SXSWi in Austin, TX on March 17th, 2015.

columns.title: More Prizes!
columns.subtitle: (Everyone Goes Home a Winner)
columns.content:
1st Runner Up:

  • 6 months free hosting on Bowtie
  • Startup Legal setup from Lerner Venture Law
  • BowTie.io Team Hooded Sweatshirts

Audience Choice:

  • 6 months free hosting on Bowtie
  • Occulus Rift Dev Kit 2!
  • BowTie.io Team Hooded Sweatshirts

All Competitors:

  • 3 months free hosting on BowTie
  • A pile of awesome discounts and merchandise from our sponsors.
  • Food, craft beer and fun at Demo Day reception on Feb.13th

countdown.complete: Registration is now closed. Please join us for Demo Day on Feb.13th at FatpipeABQ.

sections.title: Format + Rules
sections.body:
Teams (1-3 people, 30 teams Max) will compete by launching their projects on ⋈ BowTie's frontend hosting platform. Springboard begins with an intro and hackathon with the ⋈ BowTie founders on Jan 31st from 11:00a - 3:00p at FatPipe ABQ (lunch provided). Teams reconvene for a public Demo Day at FatPipe ABQ on Feb. 13th.

Judges (TBD) will announce the Grand Prize, Runner Up and Audience Choice awards at 6:30p with a reception to follow (craft beer, snacks, music).

Every idea is valid, but we encourage software that can take advantage of the tools offered by the ⋈ BowTie MVP (software products, social sites, web applications, tools that leverage membership, etc.). Competitors may be remote, but preference will be given to local participants as registration fills. Students are welcome to participate.

⋈ BowTie assumes no ownership of your project. We just want to help you get out the door.

sections.subtitle: ⋈ BowTie Springboard would not be possible without:
